title: Bitcoin, Pfizer, Uber, GM: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: The cryptocurrency was back above $50,000; Pfizer shares are up ahead of an expected full approval of its Covid-19 shot
body:
Stock futures are ticking higher, suggesting that the major indexes will kick off Monday’s trading on the front foot after a bumpy week. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of the open.
Join Our Summer Stock-Picking Contest: Test your investing savvy against our Heard on the Street writers to predict the best-performing stock for the rest of 2021.
